description: I think the game looks beautiful but I was not sure how to start it as I pressed every button on my keyboard but couldn't get passed the first screen. I wish there was some instructions on how to get it working.
summary: Looks like it could be a great game

description: There seems to be no controls for this game

a bit relatively easy, but it's fine
for those wondering what the controls are - it's the default for shoot-em-ups z, x, and arrow buttons
